pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to the NS (Dutch Railways) API // Access the NS api and download current departure times, disruptions and engineering work, the station list, and travel recommendations from station to station. All results will be returned as a 'data.frame'. NS (Nederlandse Spoorwegen; Dutch Railways) is the largest train travel provider in the Netherlands. for more information about the API itself see https://www.ns.nl/en/travel-information/ns- api. To use the API, and this package, you will need to obtain a username and password. More information about authentication and the use of the functions are described in the vignette.
